p: We aligned these genomes with MAFFT v6.902b [ 43] using the parameters (L-INS-i): --localpair --maxiterate 1000 --reorder --ep 0.123. We trimmed the alignment using trimAl v1.4 [ 44] with -automated1. Lastly, we generated a maximum likelihood tree with RAxML v7.3.0 [ 45] under a generalized time-reversible (GTRÎ³) nucleotide substitution model with 100 bootstrap pseudoreplicates ( Figure 1).
